title: Refund a champ bought with IP?
body:
Is this possible?

I honestly don't ever care about the IP itself, I just want 2 champs removed from my champ pool (singed and ryze) cus I play a lot of Aram and I can't stand when they get picked...

My champ pool is decent, so the random is pretty random, and any other champ I get is fine... but I don't play these 2 even in normals/rift, cus I can't stand them, and it makes me bang my head against the wall when I get them in Aram.

Possible to refund them, even if bought with IP?

replies.body: No worries, I'm sure those champs won't take it personally.  Some just don't fit our playstyle, and that's okay!  If you have any refund tokens and the unlock was within 90 days, you can get your IP back per the [refund](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ) guidelines.  If you're all out, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see if there's anything we can do.  I hope that helps!
